short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple, but clear to-do list extension for any of your projects!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a simple, but yet modern to-do list extension for any of your projects you are working on, for example, if you need to mark down that you need to make a UI element, but you don't have any paper, then you could use our extension to help you do that! You can delete, edit, and cross out tasks.
